about_the_game:
Have you heard about the guitar riff that opens the gates of Hell? Neither did Chuck, before he opened the portal and pulled into hellish depths. Guided by two-headed goat (that never shuts up because of its pair of mouth), reach the last circle and beat the hell out of Lucifer. Only as a Infernal Lord, you can get out of this pit and finish your gig.





The possesor of suffering souls can choose their fate - release them or increase their torment. As an aspiring ruler of hell, you’ll also have this opportunity.

Have a short chat over a mug of hot tar and know soul’s darkest sins. Maybe you’ll finally figure out what your dead neighbor was doing when his wife was on a business trip…





Demons listen to metal… Haha, nice one. These muscled bastards put on a summer pop hits playlist at their huts. Do you know when souls suffer the most? At the moment when some demon leaves his window opened.

It’s time to end it - crush these hell freaks with the sound of Chuck’s guitar and listen to the unique metal soundtrack!





Most of medieval monks who dubbed in illumination, presently burns in hell for their monastic mischief, but their work survived for future generations to learn from.

Step into nine illustrated circles of hell inspired by medieval illuminations - Observe the daily life of demons, comb the nooks to find cursed artifacts and traverse boiling regions filled to the brim with souls of scoundrels and villains. Just like picking up a medieval book.




Hell is full of weirdos - from muscle demons who don’t skip leg day, to stray souls of worst criminals. Some of them will get in your way and others… also will get in your way, but’ll let you go in exchange for small bribe.

Out of cash or need to install new wheels to the chariot? Trick these bastards or kick their butts - the choice is up to you.




Many villains enslaved in hell are total losers (just like during their lives), but there are also some smart ones that will help you gain an advantage in battle. Searching a perfect member can take some time, but on other hand, you can always perform a dark ritual and summon a powerful demon that will power up your team.

Build an army of freaks and test your tactical thinking in battles, using various skills, items and combinations.



Features:

  • Become the ruler of hell
  • Decide the fate of suffering souls
  • Expand your hellish kingdom
  • Build an army by choosing from many units with unique abilities
  • Settle matters peacefully or prove yourself tactically in battles
  • Explore the nine circles of illustrated hell

  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel i3 6th gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Become the first Metalhead Ruler of Hell in this illustrated RPG with a fresh approach to the combat system! Recruit a team of hellish freaks, kick the butts of demons to the rythm of metal and decide the fate of souls! All of this in hand-drawn art style inspired by medieval illuminations.
